metadata.name: Paper Mario Soundtrack
metadata.description:
This pack features music from all three Paper Mario games. A full track list can be found below, or as a spreadsheet [url=https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1LBzZDySzi6j4MmV2G6iUl_ay89f4p9WnycqF2KH-LAw/edit?usp=sharing]here[/url]. All of the music loops as it should.
This mod requires the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=1933285222]Soundtrack Menu[/url].
Track List: Basement - Gloam Valley - SPM Cellar - Rogueport - TTYD Burning Basement - Hot Times in Mt. Lavalava - PM1 Caves - Rogueport Sewers - TTYD Catacombs - Hooktail's Castle - TTYD Flooded Caves - Shhwonk Fortress - TTYD Depths - Yold Ruins - SPM Necropolis - Floro Sapien Caverns - SPM Dank Depths - Siege on Bowser's Castle - PM1 Womb/Utero - X-Naut Fortress - TTYD Scarred Womb - The Moon - TTYD Blue Womb - Pit of 100 Trials - TTYD Sheol - The Underwhere - SPM Cathedral - Crystal Palace Crawl - PM1 Dark Room - Deep Into the Shadows - TTYD Chest - Pit of 100 Trials - SPM Void - Castle Bleck - SPM Boss Splash Screen - Enemy Surprise! - TTYD Boss (Normal) - Battle Theme - TTYD Boss (Mom) - Attack of the Koopa Bros. - PM1 Boss (Mom's Heart) - Boss - The Smorgs - TTYD Boss (Satan) - King of the Koopas - PM1 Boss (Isaac) - I'm Not Nice - SPM Boss (The Lamb) - Boss - Shadow Queen Part 1 (Peach Form) - TTYD Boss (???) - Closing Battle - SPM Defeated Boss - Battle Won! - TTYD Boss (alternate) - Ready... GO! - SPM Defeated Boss (alternate) - Glitz Pit Outro - TTYD Boss (Hush) - The Ultimate Show (Short Intro) - SPM Defeated Hush - Pure Heart Get (No Intro) - SPM Boss (Mega Satan) - Boss - Bowser - TTYD Boss (Ultra Greed) - Boss - Rawk Hawk - TTYD Boss (Delirium) - Boss - Shadow Queen Part 2 - TTYD Empty Boss Room - A City in the Stars - PM1 Challenge Room Fight - One Shot - SPM Challenge Room Completed - New Item - PM1 Secret Room - Tower of Riddles - TTYD Devil Room - Creepy Steeple - TTYD Angel Room - The Sanctum - TTYD Shop - Forget Me Not - SPM Library - Merlon's Hut (Toad Town) - PM1 Arcade Room - The 65th Super Fun Quirk Quiz - TTYD Treasure Room Entry 1 - Item Get - SPM Treasure Room Entry 2 - Found An Item - TTYD Treasure Room Entry 3 - Found A Badge - TTYD Treasure Room Entry 2 - Get Important Item - TTYD Holy Room Find - Event / Switch - SPM Secret Room Find - Secret Revealed - TTYD Devil Room Appear - Something Bad Shows Up - TTYD
